comments.body: Done as a Christmas gift ;)  Didn't think I'd ever do another Tomcat 5.0 issue ;)

description:
A fix for this bug has already been accepted for the Tomcat 5.5 branch, see

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=33636

ExpandWar is identical for 5.0.x and 5.5.x.

Would anyone object applying that patch to 5.0 as well?

If not, maybe one of the committers could be so kind.
summary: ExpandWar doesn't set the lastModified attribute
